query.sql: INSERT INTO stock_money( stock_code,trade_date,close_price,growth,m_amt,m_ratio,sb_amt,sb_ratio,b_amt, b_ratio,md_amt,md_ratio,s_amt,s_ratio,create_time ) VALUES( [ stock_code ] , [ trade_date ] , [ close_price ] , [ growth ] , [ m_amt ] , [ m_ratio ] , [ sb_amt ] , [ sb_ratio ] , [ b_amt ] , [ b_ratio ] , [ md_amt ] , [ md_ratio ] , [ s_amt ] , [ s_ratio ] , now() )
